definition: to kick/to play (e.g. soccer)/(slang) butch (in a lesbian relationship)
foot/leg (of an animal or an object)/base (of an object)/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]/classifier for kicks
board/plank/plate/shutter/table tennis bat/clappers (music)/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/accented beat in Chinese music/hard/stiff/to stop smiling or look serious

sentences.english: Draw the simple design around the baseboard with a catchy color contrast.
sentences.chinese: 用醒目的顏色在踢腳板上畫好簡單的設計。
